__e: I'm afraid the... err... the liquid is not too warm, but the cold here is so intense, it even robs a flame of its heat.
His mates sent word that there'd be a rumble on Monday at the Marco Polo Bridge.
- And that's when we say good-bye to Marco Polo.
- I will not agree to this!
Mrs. Marko, I think this boy is a mistake.
I can understand my lord's concern, and it is my fault that he is not here.

I know you and Marco didn't do a thing, right?
Whoa. Check on all the others. Don't use the radio.

Don't talk nonsense. Marco just happens to be here, like us.

Ain't Marko always given you everything he possibly could?
Marco did not mention them to us.
